1370: Harlo was born in Scherbier straet in 1370.
Got married to Ymmekine at age 23 in 1370.
1376: Had a son with Ymmekine, Gheuardus, at age 29.
1377: Had a son with Ymmekine, Kerstiaen, at age 30.
1380: Had a son with Ymmekine, Gheynekine, at age 33.
1382: Had a son with Ymmekine, Reymbernus, at age 35.
1383: Lost son Gheynekine when Gheynekine was 4 years old.
1384: Had a son with Ymmekine, Lammekin, at age 37.
1386: Had a son with Ymmekine, Herardus, at age 39.
